name: Dance with Snow Queen – Princess Dancing Game
name_original: Dance with Snow Queen – Princess Dancing Game
description:
The fairy princess Snow Queen is wearing her best dress from the wardrobe because she is going to dance in the royal dancing party. Snow Queen is eager to take part in the party, maybe she will meet her dreamy prince and dance with him. Help her dance the most beautiful moves and make her gorgeous on our 3D dance floor! Choose the best dance moves among 10 dance options. Which dance moves will she choose?
Let’s see and just dance!
You can download a version without ads.
